# Application areas {#sec-0-applications}
::: {.callout-note}
The following is a non-exhaustive list of common application areas of Industrial Data Science.
:::

## Process optimization
- Energy consumption prediction and optimization
- Improving production efficiency
- Improving production quality
- Supply chain optimization by predicting market demands

## Quality control
- Automated visual inspection
- Defect prediction to mitigate multistage propagation
- Online quality prediction

## Predictive maintenance
- Detecting possible problems before they occur
- Reducing unnecessary inspection and maintenance operations

## Human-Robot collaboration and ergonomics
- Workforce training
- Task support
- Collaborative robotics
- Ergonomics
